group_1.textRight: Hey, miss vampire maid~
Our table is all out of sweets~
Ehehe~ Trick or treat!

group_1.textLeft: Very well. I'll get on it right away.
I'm curious to learn what tricks you might have@in store, Ui...
But I shall ignore your proposition for now.

group_1.textRight: So this is the military-style maid there's been@so much fuss about.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the concept, it seems a bit chaotic,@doesn't it?
Thank you for the wait.

group_1.textRight: That took no time at all!

group_1.textLeft: I simply borrowed sweets from other tables,@that's all.
Go on and choose whichever delicacies suit@your fancy, now.
Hm, is there something else you want? You're@staring at me so intently...

group_1.textRight: Ah, not really...
Now that I got to see it up close, it’s@incredible...
So much that it shocked me for a second...

group_1.textLeft: Are you referring to my outfit...?
That Yakumo really might've put too much@enthusiasm into designing it.
Accounting for the need to stand out on stage@even when viewed from afar may have backfired.

group_1.textRight: This outfit looks very realistic and skillfully@crafted. I must admit as much.

group_1.textLeft: But if it stands in the way of enjoying the@party...
That settles it. Let me go get myself changed@this instant...

group_1.textRight: Hey, hold on, please! It's fine.
Your outfit shocked me for a second, sure...
But I don't feel intimidated at all because I@know that it's you under the costume, Kanagi.

group_1.textLeft: What you're saying is...
You already recognize me and can keep your@composure because of that.

group_1.textRight: Yep!
It'd be a different story if I ran into some@stranger wearing this costume on the street.
That might have actually scared me.
There's no reason to be afraid of you, because@we're friends.

group_1.textLeft: Nothing wrong with this outfit, really~

group_1.textRight: A person's inner nature is what truly invokes@fear in us.
Conversely, no matter how much a person's outward@appearance might clash with their kind personality...
So long as you are aware of their true character,@you won't be taken by terror.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe a real vampire wouldn't be scary to talk to@either, if we ever met one!
...Hrmm. I see your point. I shall stay dressed@like this, then.
Ui is such a baby, all things considered~

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Regardless of how nice or evil any vampire might@be...
There's no reason to be afraid of them in the@first place.

group_1.textRight: Why is that?

group_1.textLeft: Come on~ Vampires have as many weaknesses as@there are stars in the sky, don’t they~?

group_1.textRight: That's true, now that you mention it.
Yeah, vampires have plenty of easily exploitable@weaknesses.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly!
Let me say it again.
There's nothing scary about creatures as@critically vulnerable as vampires!
BOO!!!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
W-what was that?

group_1.textLeft: I just decided to get a little angry on behalf of@the vampires whose pride is being injured.

group_1.textRight: Geeezzz~!!

group_1.textLeft: M-my apologies. Making you upset wasn't my@intention...

group_1.narration: ―Kanagi―@And this is the proof.@Do forgive me.
―Touka―@Huh, what is this supposed to be...?
―Kanagi―@This is my expression of love given to Satomi@to cancel out the distress I caused.
―Touka―@Hmm, you know, this makes me feel more disgust than anything...
―Ui―@Touka, please!@K-Kanagi looks very cute in this pose, if you ask me.
―Nemu―@If anything, we might have just witnessed@an especially rare sight.
